ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Country = 'Sweden', LEFT($User.Username, 27) != 'servicenow.integrationuser@', ISPICKVAL(New_or_Renewal__c, 'New'), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), '5 - Awarded'), $Permission.Bypass_validation_rule = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact Elisabeth Heidenstrøm for assistance: Opportunity stage can not be changed from “5-Awarded”
